pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.3: “Raped” renders _dūsenti_. For a discussion of this word, see Appendix I: Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.14: For a discussion of the rendering “inhabited area” for _gāma_, see Appendix I: Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.15: “Six kilometers” renders _addhayojana_, “half a _yojana_”. For further discussion of the _yojana_, see _sugata_ in Appendix I: Technical Terms.
